name: Experimental Union
description:
Through asuran ingenuity, you are host to a mercurial mold. You are able to command it using selectable morph skills that replace your toolbelt skills or even fully merge with it to evolve into a superior being.
Morph skills selected will alter the composition of the mercurial mold, changing the bonuses it grants you when you evolve.
Gain access to stance utility skills.

skills.description:
Offensive Artifact. Summons a Kryptis turret at your targeted location and fires at the closest foe in range.

For a short time after using this skill, you deal increased damage to enemies that were struck by the turret.

Defensive Artifact. Summon a holo-dancer decoy that taunts enemies. It self-destructs if it is not destroyed, dealing damage to enemies in a large area. 

For a short time after using this skill, the next utility skill you use has reduced cooldown.

skills.description:
Defensive Artifact. Break stuns and dash toward your target, damaging and burning enemies around you when you reach your destination. You evade attacks as long as you are still traveling.

For a short time after using this skill, you may use this skill again if it struck an enemy. Using the skill in this way does not count as using an artifact.

description: Gain access to Release Potential, Cosmic Wisdom, and Legendary Entity Stance. Gain affinity while using legend skills, which increases the effectiveness of Release Potential.
